data.description:
"XR Layout" streamlines the process of redecorating a room.

You can easily rearrange a variety of 3D models and wallpapers provided, or upload your own custom items.
And you have the option to borrow 3D models and wallpapers from friends.
(Uploads can be made through the related service at https://xrsns.com.)

This tool is valuable for both personal and business use, such as moving or designing new home layouts.
It allows for testing various furniture placements in advance to reduce errors when purchasing actual pieces.
Explore imaginative designs with "XR Layout".
(Detailed operating instructions can be found at https://xrlayout.com.)


◆List of Functions◆
Summon models
Change wallpapers
Change background music
Check your own data
Volume control
Switch language

◆Controls◆
The upper trigger on the right controller operates the menu panel.

◆How to manipulate the 3D model◆
Please do the below with the laser on the 3D model.

Move: Move with the left controller stick.
Zoom in/out: Click the B button on the right controller.
Rotate: Click the A button on the right controller.
Reset rotation: Double-click the A button on the right controller.
Gravity: Click the X button on the left controller.
Delete: Click the bottom trigger on the right controller.

◆Special thanks◆
BGM: (C)K.Y. (C)L-side (C)効果音ラボ
Model: (C)3D Shaker
Image: (C)Pixabay

changelog.change_log:
Improved the process when launching the application.
An error code is now displayed in case of an error when launching the application.
The detailed version is now displayed.

アプリ起動時の工程を改善しました。
アプリ起動時にエラーの場合はエラーコードが出るようにしました。
詳細なバージョンが表示されるようにしました。

Added an announcement if the "space setting" is not done in the Quest3 settings.

Quest3の設定で「スペースの設定」を行ってない場合のアナウンスを追加しました。

Operation around authentication has been improved.
Fixed minor bugs.

認証周りの操作を改善しました。
軽微なバグを修正しました。
